location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 195 x 160mmMaterials: Manuscript; ink on paper

mods.abstract: The map is appended to an agenda for a meeting, held at the Air Ministry at 11:00am on 25 January 1945, to discuss the provision of further aviation refuelling facilities at Bahrain in the form of tankage and a pipeline: see folio 58 for the agenda and folio 60-61 for the minutes.The proposed pipeline between the jetty on Sitra Island and the landing ground at Muharraq Island is highlighted in pink. The location of Manama, the Bahrain Petroleum Company's (BAPCO's) refinery, and the flying boat landing area are also marked on the map.
